explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black apron sits in front of the camera with face paint on his right cheek and golden thumbtacks covering his left cheek. Behind him stands a man wearing a red shirt. The background is a barbershop filled with various items.

[0-8] The man in the red shirt straightens the man in the black apron and takes out a purple balloon from the side, popping it against the thumbtacks on the man's left cheek. The man in the black apron smiles. The man in red then takes out a red balloon and pops it, followed by a green and a pink balloon, popping each one. The man in the black apron maintains a smile throughout.
